Name: The Zen
Review Text: Great Place! Amazing vibes. The place to be to enjoy some reggea music and very tatty authentic surinam food. On the weekends is usually either live music or a DJ  (reggea/dancehall music) and dancing.

Name: The Zen
Review Text: Great meeting place in Amsterdam East. Stiching Suver Nuver meets here every Sunday. Healing the nation one by one.
